desc: Buy tea directly from a real tea farm so you know where and how it was grown and produced and who are the people behind it. We have the widest selection of organic Georgian teas - all the teas we sell, we produce ourselves. The selection includes green tea, black tea, oolong tea, white tea.

layout.text:
RENEGADE TEA ESTATE IS NOT A TEA SHOP.
WE ARE FARMERS, WE GROW TEA.
WE GROW IT FOR YOU.
Get your yearly tea supply from your very own tea garden.
